document_data.name: Lake of the Emerald Eye
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lake of the Emerald Eye''' was located in the [[Land of the Yak-Men]] within the dominating heights of the [[World Pillar Mountains]] in northeast [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Geography: The lake was found within the [[Red Goat]] province near the heart of the [[Yikarian Empire]]. Due to the extreme elevation, the water of the lake was ice-cold.
document_data.History: The Lake of the Emerald Eye was a site favored for performing [[water]] sacrifices to [[the Faceless God]] of the [[yak-folk]].
